entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 24. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 60 km/h gusting to 80. Temperature steady near minus 24. Wind chill minus 43 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
